cu.explanation_en: Setting the physical log level to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and prevent proper physical layer log output.

du.explanation_en: Setting the do SRS to an out-of-range value of 3 will cause SRS configuration errors and prevent proper sounding reference signal transmission.
du.explanation_zh: 將 do SRS 設定為超出範圍的值 3，會導致 SRS 配置錯誤，並阻止正確的聲音參考信號傳輸。
